snippet: The British period-instrument ensemble Fretwork performed Thomas Mace’s “Musick’s Monument” at Weill Recital Hall on Wednesday.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of early music works from the 1600s performed by British period-instrument ensemble Fretwork at the Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: The British period-instrument ensemble Fretwork performed Thomas Mace’s “Musick’s Monument” at Weill Recital Hall on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Fretwork Performs at Weill Recital Hall
headline.main: A Quirky List of Great Hits of the 1600s
headline.print_headline: A Quirky List Of Great Hits Of the 1600s
